Authors

General License Definitions
---------------------------

The following section contains the full license texts for Create-Python-Project and the
documentation.

-   "AUTHORS" hereby refers to all the authors listed in the
    :ref:`authors` section.

-   The ":ref:`license`" applies to all the source code shipped as
    part of Create-Python-Project (Create-Python-Projectitself as well as the examples and the unit tests)
    as well as documentation.
